title: Eternal Splendor: Polki Diamond and Emerald Haar
materials: deep green hue). Features signature Hyderabadi Polish for enhanced brilliance.
features: This regal Haar showcases a cascading arrangement of Polki diamonds, each meticulously hand-set in a closed setting to maximize their inherent brilliance. The square diamond motifs create a geometric contrast to the round diamond links. The centerpiece is a captivating natural Emerald, surrounded by a halo of Polki diamonds in a floral motif. The design reflects classic South Indian aesthetics with a contemporary twist, perfectly suited for the modern bride.
occasions: Ideal for grand occasions like weddings (Vivaham)
and significant cultural events. Perfect for a bride's Muhurtham or any special occasion where you desire to make a statement.
description: This Haar is a testament to timeless elegance and exquisite craftsmanship. The use of uncut Polki diamonds, a signature of Mughal-era jewelry, lends it a unique, antique charm. The contrasting colors of the Polki diamonds and the Emerald create a striking visual appeal. Made with high-quality 22K gold and showcasing superior craftsmanship, this is an heirloom piece that will be cherished for generations. Its traditional design with a modern touch makes it versatile and wearable with both traditional and contemporary attire.
